page.title: 04LEISURE
page.content: From a survey we found that tastes in entertainment tended to vary between different age groups.Teenagers liked pop music and discos while older people,especially 50 + often preferred Theatre and Classical music.Ballroom Dancing and Music Recitals were also mentioned.Many people go out of Strathven to Glasgow, East Kilbride and Hamilton in order to find suitable entertainment. Many people thought that a new Cinema was needed(the old one was unprofitable) since the nearest is in Hamilton.Young people also said a Discotheque was needed to keep teenagers off the streets.There are attempts to raise money for a Swimming Pool beside the new Sports Centre. The Ballgreen Hall is the scene of many discos and concerts and the Town Mill of plays. The other main leisure facility is the Sports Centre.
